ps1.3:1.1: Soḷasavatthukaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhiṃ bhāvayato samadhikāni dve ñāṇasatāni uppajjanti—
ps1.3:1.2: aṭṭha paripanthe ñāṇāni, aṭṭha ca upakāre ñāṇāni, aṭṭhārasa upakkilese ñāṇāni, terasa vodāne ñāṇāni, bāttiṃsa satokārissa ñāṇāni, catuvīsati samādhivasena ñāṇāni, dvesattati vipassanāvasena ñāṇāni, aṭṭha nibbidāñāṇāni, aṭṭha nibbidānulomañāṇāni, aṭṭha nibbidāpaṭippassaddhiñāṇāni, ekavīsati vimuttisukhe ñāṇāni.
ps1.3:2.1: Katamāni aṭṭha paripanthe ñāṇāni, aṭṭha ca upakāre ñāṇāni?
ps1.3:2.2: Kāmacchando samādhissa paripantho, nekkhammaṃ samādhissa upakāraṃ.
ps1.3:2.3: Byāpādo samādhissa paripantho, abyāpādo samādhissa upakāraṃ.
ps1.3:2.4: Thinamiddhaṃ samādhissa paripantho, ālokasaññā samādhissa upakāraṃ.
ps1.3:2.5: Uddhaccaṃ samādhissa paripantho, avikkhepo samādhissa upakāraṃ.
ps1.3:2.6: Vicikicchā samādhissa paripantho, dhammavavatthānaṃ samādhissa upakāraṃ.
ps1.3:2.7: Avijjā samādhissa paripantho, ñāṇaṃ samādhissa upakāraṃ.
ps1.3:2.8: Arati samādhissa paripantho, pāmojjaṃ samādhissa upakāraṃ.
ps1.3:2.9: Sabbepi akusalā dhammā samādhissa paripanthā, sabbepi kusalā dhammā samādhissa upakārā.
ps1.3:2.10: Imāni aṭṭha paripanthe ñāṇāni, aṭṭha ca upakāre ñāṇāni.
ps1.3:3.1: Imehi soḷasahi ākārehi uducitaṃ cittaṃ samuducitaṃ cittaṃ ekatte santiṭṭhati, nīvaraṇehi visujjhati.
